data.message: As you have not answered my question and I don't know if you will be notified about responses, I shall ask again: Are any of your products suitable for vegans, yes or no? Vegans do not eat any animal products.

replies.message:
Hi PJ, 

Apologies for any confusion. 

We can confirm that Coca-Cola is free from animal derivatives and therefore suitable for vegans. 

The following drinks are not free from animal derivatives and are therefore unsuitable for vegans.

•	Lilt
•	Lilt Zero 
•	Kia-Ora Orange Squash No Added Sugar
•	Schweppes Orange Squash 
•	Glaceau Vitaminwater Zero Sunshine and Multi V. 

All other drinks in our range in the UK are suitable for vegans.
